RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_EXRATE_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_EXRATE_CCY.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.CCY = LBTBS_BORROWER_EXRATE_CCY.DD_CCY

LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_INTRATE_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_INTRATE_CCY.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.CCY = LBTBS_BORROWER_INTRATE_CCY.DD_CCY

LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_NOTC_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_NOTC_CCY.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY.CCY = LBTBS_BORROWER_NOTC_CCY.DD_CCY

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CCY, B.CCY_NAME FROM LBTBS_FACILITY_CCY A, CYTMS_CCY_DEFN B, OLTBS_CONTRACT C WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = (SELECT L.FACILITY_REF_NO FROM LBVWS_BORROWER_SUMMARY L WHERE L.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ?) AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = C.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.VERSION_NO = C.LATEST_VERSION_NO AND A.CCY = B.CCY_CODE AND A.CCY NOT IN (SELECT CCY FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND VERSION_NO = ?) UNION SELECT '*.*', 'ALL CURRENCIES' FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND VERSION_NO = ? AND CCY = '*.*')
SELECT HOLIDAY_CCY,CCY_NAME FROM LBTMS_PRODUCT_EXRATE_CCY A,CYTMS_CCY_DEFN B WHERE A.HOLIDAY_CCY = B.CCY_CODE
